attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The former Langworthy Hotel has been earmarked for demolition. It is the only old building of historical and community interest left on Langworthy Rd, Salford 6. 
Salford City Council has left the building to languish and it has lain empty for many years, despite attempts to secure it as a community asset. This government actively encourages and advocates asset(building)transfer to local communities. 
We ask that Salford City Council reconsider the proposal to demolish this lovely old building and support the asset transfer option.

rejection.details: Please contact your local council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
